trans-unit.source: Sets the pixels in a compatible bitmap using the color data found in a DIB

seg-source.mrk: Sets the pixels in a compatible bitmap using the color data found in a DIB

target.mrk: Sets the pixels in a compatible bitmap using the color data found in a DIB

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a device context

target.mrk: Handle to a device context

trans-unit.source: Handle to the compatible bitmap (DDB) that is to be altered using the color data from the DIB

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the compatible bitmap (DDB) that is to be altered using the color data from the DIB

target.mrk: Handle to the compatible bitmap (DDB) that is to be altered using the color data from the DIB

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting scan line for the device-independent color data in the array pointed to by the $pBits parameter.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the starting scan line for the device-independent color data in the array pointed to by the $pBits parameter.

target.mrk: Specifies the starting scan line for the device-independent color data in the array pointed to by the $pBits parameter.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of scan lines found in the array containing device-independent color data

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of scan lines found in the array containing device-independent color data

target.mrk: Specifies the number of scan lines found in the array containing device-independent color data

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the DIB color data, stored as an array of bytes.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to the DIB color data, stored as an array of bytes.

target.mrk: Pointer to the DIB color data, stored as an array of bytes.

trans-unit.source: The format of the bitmap values depends on the biBitCount member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure pointed to by the $pBMI parameter.

seg-source.mrk: The format of the bitmap values depends on the biBitCount member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure pointed to by the $pBMI parameter.

target.mrk: The format of the bitmap values depends on the biBitCount member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure pointed to by the $pBMI parameter.

trans-unit.source: A $tagBITMAPINFO structure or a pointer to it that contains information about the DIB

seg-source.mrk: A $tagBITMAPINFO structure or a pointer to it that contains information about the DIB

target.mrk: A $tagBITMAPINFO structure or a pointer to it that contains information about the DIB

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether the iColors member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure was provided and, if so,

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether the iColors member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure was provided and, if so,

target.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether the iColors member of the $tagBITMAPINFO structure was provided and, if so,

trans-unit.source: whether iColors contains explicit red, green, blue (RGB) values or palette indexes.

seg-source.mrk: whether iColors contains explicit red, green, blue (RGB) values or palette indexes.

target.mrk: whether iColors contains explicit red, green, blue (RGB) values or palette indexes.

trans-unit.source: The $iColorUse parameter must be one of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: The $iColorUse parameter must be one of the following values:

target.mrk: The $iColorUse parameter must be one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: 0 - The color table is provided and contains literal RGB values

seg-source.mrk: 0 - The color table is provided and contains literal RGB values

target.mrk: 0 - The color table is provided and contains literal RGB values

trans-unit.source: 1 - The color table consists of an array of 16-bit indexes into the logical palette of $hDC

seg-source.mrk: 1 - The color table consists of an array of 16-bit indexes into the logical palette of $hDC

target.mrk: 1 - The color table consists of an array of 16-bit indexes into the logical palette of $hDC

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: True

seg-source.mrk: True

target.mrk: True

trans-unit.source: False

seg-source.mrk: False

target.mrk: False

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: The device context identified by the $hDC parameter is used only if the $iColorUse is set to 1, otherwise it is ignored.

seg-source.mrk: The device context identified by the $hDC parameter is used only if the $iColorUse is set to 1, otherwise it is ignored.

target.mrk: The device context identified by the $hDC parameter is used only if the $iColorUse is set to 1, otherwise it is ignored.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap identified by the hBmp parameter must not be selected into a device context when this function is called.

seg-source.mrk: The bitmap identified by the hBmp parameter must not be selected into a device context when this function is called.

target.mrk: The bitmap identified by the hBmp parameter must not be selected into a device context when this function is called.

trans-unit.source: The scan lines must be aligned on a DWORD except for RLE compressed bitmaps.

seg-source.mrk: The scan lines must be aligned on a DWORD except for RLE compressed bitmaps.

target.mrk: The scan lines must be aligned on a DWORD except for RLE compressed bitmaps.

trans-unit.source: The origin for bottom up DIBs is the lower left corner of the bitmap; the origin for top down DIBs is the upper left corner of the bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: The origin for bottom up DIBs is the lower left corner of the bitmap; the origin for top down DIBs is the upper left corner of the bitmap.

target.mrk: The origin for bottom up DIBs is the lower left corner of the bitmap; the origin for top down DIBs is the upper left corner of the bitmap.
